Description: A square label: perforated at the top right-hand corner for attachment. The front surface bears an incised hieroglyphic inscription. This label has been repaired from two fragments and is slightly curved, although its shape has probably been distorted with age.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: 'Macgregor Sale Catalogue (1922)', 676c; P. E. Newberry, ‘Proceedings of the Society of Biblical Archaeology’ 34 (London, 1912), pl. XXXI, 2; J. Garstang, Zeitschrift für Ägyptische Sprache und Altertumskunde 42 (Leipzig and Berlin, 1905), 63.
